name: ORGANHUNT
description:
A stealth game where you need to avoid getting your organs harvested by a pack of organ-harvesting werewolves who drive a 2006 Cadillac Escalade.  As one does.

Inspired by a daydream I had walking home one evening.

INSTRUCTIONS:

WASD or arrow keys or Spacebar to move.

Spacebar to progress through menus.

Don't get your organs harvested by a pack of werewolves!
